Text: Re Need Information for AuditI am now dealing with this I have lists of exchanges but no one has provided information on their clearing functions as requested so I am chasing again today Regards Lorna Edmund Cooper To Lorna CT cc Subject Need Information for Audit Lorna could you give Tana an update today Thanks Edmund Forwarded by Edmund CooperLONECT on PM Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp From Tana Jones PM To Edmund CT cc Subject Need Information for Audit Edmund You are the only person I have now not heard from When can I expect to get your response Forwarded by Tana JonesHOUECT on AM Enron North America Corp From Tana Jones PM To Edmund CT David MinnsENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Matthias CT cc Subject Need Information for Audit I have not received any feedback from Edmund or David regarding the email below Can you please respond as I am getting daily prompts for a response MUCH THANKS For Matt your email stated that you trade over the IPE NYMEX What rules besides the rules of those two exchanges might apply to any on or off exchange trades you might enter into For instance here in the US energy commodity trades might be governed by the CFTC where out equity options might be governed by the SEC Besides the exchanges your email reflected what other governmental rules or regulations would govern trades you might enter into Forwarded by Tana JonesHOUECT on PM Enron North America Corp From Tana Jones AM To Edmund CT David MinnsENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Matthias CT cc Mark CT Subject Need Information for Audit In connection with an internal audit regarding the safekeeping of margin funds and securities Enron Corp has asked us to provide them with a list of all the exchanges we trade on what rules govern those exchanges and the products we trade on them in particular the clearing arrangements and any rules that govern brokers we may maintain funds or cash with This should include all the products we may tradehedge over an exchange including energy commodities interest rates currencies equities etc Can you please provide this information no later than Friday of next week Much thanks
Lorna JonesLONECT is out of the officewill be out of the office from until I will respond to your message when I return

Exchanges Cc able to provide any further information Kind regards Lorna Forwarded by Lorna JonesLONECT on Lorna Jones To Annette CT Debbie CT Christopher CT cc Subject Exchanges Dear All Many thanks for your responses however I would greatly appreciate some more information I attach the email that was sent to me last week requesting the information and hope this provides an adequate guide Many thanks and have a great Easter break Lorna Enron North America Corp From Tana Jones AM To Edmund CT David MinnsENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Matthias CT cc Mark CT Subject Need Information for Audit In connection with an internal audit regarding the safekeeping of margin funds and securities Enron Corp has asked us to provide them with a list of all the exchanges we trade on what rules govern those exchanges and the products we trade on them in particular the clearing arrangements and any rules that govern brokers we may maintain funds or cash with This should include all the products we may tradehedge over an exchange including energy commodities interest rates currencies equities etc Can you please provide this information no later than Friday of next week Much thanks

Exchanges Cc All So far the only information that I have received is that we are members of International Petroleum Exchange Amsterdam Power Exchange NV APX Spanish Pool Mercadeo de electricidad Omel and UK Pool However as you can see from the email from Tana Jones attached at the bottom this does not complete all the information she needs Can anyone provide any further information if not please can you let me alternative sources Many thanks Lorna Forwarded by Lorna JonesLONECT on Lorna Jones To Annette CT Debbie CT Christopher CT cc Tana CT Subject Exchanges Is anyone able to provide any further information Kind regards Lorna Forwarded by Lorna JonesLONECT on Lorna Jones To Annette CT Debbie CT Christopher CT cc Subject Exchanges Dear All Many thanks for your responses however I would greatly appreciate some more information I attach the email that was sent to me last week requesting the information and hope this provides an adequate guide Many thanks and have a great Easter break Lorna Enron North America Corp From Tana Jones AM To Edmund CT David MinnsENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Matthias CT cc Mark CT Subject Need Information for Audit In connection with an internal audit regarding the safekeeping of margin funds and securities Enron Corp has asked us to provide them with a list of all the exchanges we trade on what rules govern those exchanges and the products we trade on them in particular the clearing arrangements and any rules that govern brokers we may maintain funds or cash with This should include all the products we may tradehedge over an exchange including energy commodities interest rates currencies equities etc Can you please provide this information no later than Friday of next week Much thanks

Membership of exchangesI am sorry this has taken so long especially as much of my efforts to collate information have turned up little The following is a list of the exchanges on which we trade International Petroleum Exchange Amsterdam Power Exchange NV APX UK Pool Spanish PoolMercadeo de electricidad Omel I have the regulation books for the IPE let me know if you want a copy and I will arrange to have it copied and couriered however it is an etremely thick binder with numerous additional updates it may be better to visit the IPE website In relation to the Spanish Pool I have the documents that Enron Espana Energia SL and Enron Energie GmbH signed when they joined the Spanish Pool however these are all in Spanish so will not provide much help it would be better to visit the website wwwomeles where youll find the Rules of the Pool and the Contract of Adhesion in English With regard to the UK Pool there are twelve volumes each volume is on average pages long the only person who has a copy of the rules is Paul Dawson here in London if there is any particular area you were interested in looking at I would suggest contacting him on In relation to the Amsterdam Pool I have couriered a copy of the latest rules to you Please let me know if you require further information Many thanks and kind regards Lorna

Brokerage Agreements England Cc In response to your request to Michael Brown et al for a copy of all brokerage agreements I attach the only other brokerage agreement that our archive department could find The other recipients of your email have let me know that they do not have any brokerage agreements Let me know if you need anything else Many thanks Lorna
